and su.username like CONCAT('%',#{requestDTO.username},'%')
and su.nickname like CONCAT('%',#{requestDTO.nickname},'%')
and EXISTS ( select 1 from sys_user su1 left join sys_user_role sur on su1.user_id = sur.user_id left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id = sur.role_id where sr.role_name = #{requestDTO.role} and su1.user_id = su.user_id )

select sr.* from sys_user_role sur LEFT JOIN sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id and sr.is_delete = 0 where sur.user_id = #{id} and sur.is_delete = 0
